tasks.title: Create project proposal
tasks.description: Draft a detailed project proposal outlining goals, deliverables, and timelines.

tasks.title: Develop wireframes
tasks.description: Create wireframes for the user interface based on project requirements.

tasks.title: Research market trends
tasks.description: Gather data on current market trends and competitors for strategic analysis.

tasks.title: Design logo concepts
tasks.description: Create several logo concepts reflecting the brand identity and values.

tasks.title: Code backend functionalities
tasks.description: Develop backend functionalities and database architecture for the project.

tasks.title: Test user authentication
tasks.description: Conduct rigorous testing of user authentication features to ensure security.

tasks.title: Prepare project documentation
tasks.description: Compile project documentation including user manuals and technical specifications.

tasks.title: Review frontend code
tasks.description: Review and provide feedback on frontend code for optimization and best practices.

tasks.title: Conduct user testing
tasks.description: Organize and conduct user testing sessions to gather feedback on usability.

tasks.title: Optimize website performance
tasks.description: Optimize website performance through code refactoring and resource minification.

tasks.title: Create marketing collateral
tasks.description: Design marketing collateral including brochures, banners, and social media graphics.

tasks.title: Write user stories
tasks.description: Draft user stories and acceptance criteria for agile development process.

tasks.title: Setup development environment
tasks.description: Configure development environment with required tools and libraries.

tasks.title: Prepare project budget
tasks.description: Estimate project costs and prepare a detailed budget report for stakeholders.

tasks.title: Implement SEO strategies
tasks.description: Implement SEO strategies to improve website visibility and ranking.

tasks.title: Create content calendar
tasks.description: Develop a content calendar outlining topics and publishing schedules.

tasks.title: Setup project management tool
tasks.description: Setup and configure a project management tool for team collaboration and task tracking.

tasks.title: Conduct stakeholder meeting
tasks.description: Schedule and conduct a meeting with project stakeholders to discuss project progress.

tasks.title: Create training materials
tasks.description: Develop training materials including guides and presentations for project implementation.

tasks.title: Review project scope
tasks.description: Review project scope and requirements to ensure alignment with stakeholders' expectations.
